dmca.title: [EV1-C1571383I] DMCA TAKEDOWN REQUEST --- abuse from your customer webprox.net at IP
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Posted At: Saturday, October 28, 2006 4:49 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [EV1-C1571383I] DMCA TAKEDOWN REQUEST --- abuse from your
customer webprox.net at IP address 70.87.44.194
Subject: [EV1-C1571383I] DMCA TAKEDOWN REQUEST --- abuse from your
customer webprox.net at IP address 70.87.44.194


==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. DMCA TAKEDOWN REQUEST --- abuse from your customer webprox.net at IP
address 70.87.44.194 Added by system at Saturday, Oct 28 2006 08:31 am
X-MailFrom: simsong@acm.org
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Sat Oct 28 09:33:16 2006

smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Sat, 28 Oct 2006 09:32:44 -0500
Return-path: <simsong@acm.org>
Delivery-date: Sat, 28 Oct 2006 09:32:44 -0500

helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com)  by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
simsong@acm.org)  with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
 (Exim)

(TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) 
        (Exim) 
        id 1GdpEn-000LSn-Vg; Sat, 28 Oct 2006 09:32:42 -0500
Received: from pool-71-126-248-126.bstnma.fios.verizon.net
([71.126.248.126] helo=[192.168.1.103]) 
        by outbound.mailhop.org with esmtpsa (TLSv1:AES128-SHA:128) 
        (Exim 4.51) 
        id 1GdpEU-000HS1-3K; Sat, 28 Oct 2006 10:32:22 -0400
X-Mail-Handler: MailHop Outbound by DynDNS
X-Originating-IP: 71.126.248.126
X-Report-Abuse-To: abuse@dyndns.com (see
http://www.mailhop.org/outbound/abuse.html for abuse reporting
information)
X-MHO-User: simsong
Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.3)
To: abuse@theplanet.com,
 legal@theplanet.com
Message-Id: <C93A9420-CE4B-4A7D-9353-5D17B1145B98@acm.org>
Content-Type: multipart/signed; micalg=sha1;
boundary=Apple-Mail-43--944868888;
protocol="application/pkcs7-signature" 
Cc: "Sybil S." <sibyl@sandstorm.net>,
 James VanBokkelen <jbvb@sandstorm.net>
Subject: DMCA TAKEDOWN REQUEST --- abuse from your customer webprox.net
at IP address 70.87.44.194
From: Simson Garfinkel <simsong@acm.org>
Date: Sat, 28 Oct 2006 10:32:04 -0400
X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.752.3)
Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 63.208.196.171 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of acm.org) client-ip=63.208.196.171;
envelope-from=simsong@acm.org; helo=outbound.mailhop.org;
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 28 Oct 2006 14:32:44.0782 (UTC)
FILETIME=[EEADE0E0:01C6FA9D] 

 (multipart/signed)
MIME element (text/plain)
To: The Planet 
From: Simson L. Garfinkel, Treasurer, Sandstorm Enterprises, Inc.

 
Greetings. 
 
Recently we discovered that a search of "Sandstorm Enterprises" on   
Google returned the URL: 
http://webprox.net/index.php?q=aHR0cDovL3d3dy5zYW5kc3Rvcm0ubmV0Lw%3D%3D 
 
This resolves to the IP address 70.87.44.194, which appears to be a   
static IP address at "Theplanet.com:" 
 
webprox.net has address 70.87.44.194
pair<~/>% traceroute  webprox.net
traceroute to webprox.net (70.87.44.194), 64 hops max, 44 byte packets
1  bodhi.pair.net (192.168.1.9)  0.447 ms  0.874 ms  0.974 ms 
2  ge-3-2-0.ar2.cle1.gblx.net (146.82.33.169)  29.887 ms  5.581 ms    
5.822 ms 
3  so1-0-0-2488m.ar1.dal2.gblx.net (67.17.73.34)  32.907 ms  32.428   
ms  32.905 ms 
4  The-Planet.ge-4-3-0.ar1.DAL2.gblx.net (64.210.104.58)  32.857 ms   
The-Planet.ge-0-2-1.ar1.DAL2.gblx.net (64.213.176.150)  32.608 ms The-
Planet.ge-4-3-0.ar1.DAL2.gblx.net (64.210.104.58)  32.540 ms 
5  te7-2.dsr01.dllstx3.theplanet.com (70.87.253.10)  127.688 ms   
te7-2.dsr02.dllstx3.theplanet.com (70.87.253.26)  32.577 ms   
te7-2.dsr01.dllstx3.theplanet.com (70.87.253.10)  88.574 ms 
6  vl42.dsr02.dllstx4.theplanet.com (70.85.127.91)  95.567 ms   
vl41.dsr01.dllstx4.theplanet.com (70.85.127.83)  34.084 ms   
vl42.dsr02.dllstx4.theplanet.com (70.85.127.91)  104.861 ms 
7  gi1-0-1.car17.dllstx4.theplanet.com (67.18.116.69)  33.121 ms   
gi1-0-2.car17.dllstx4.theplanet.com (67.18.116.85)  32.719 ms   
gi1-0-1.car17.dllstx4.theplanet.com (67.18.116.69)  33.514 ms 
8  c2.2c.5746.static.theplanet.com (70.87.44.194)  33.676 ms  33.581   
ms  33.895 ms 
 
 
When we visited the URL we saw the web page for Sandstorm   
Enterprises, Inc, frame by an advertisement for "webprox.net" 
 
It appears that webprox.net is proxying requests through to   
Sandstorm's website. 
 
The company webprox.net is not authorized to frame Sandstorm's   
content. Further, by framing Sandstorm's content, Webprox.net has   
affected our standing on the Google search results. 
 
We have modified Sandstorm's web server so that HTTP requests from   
70.87.44.194 now return a page advising customers to go to   
www.sandstorm.net. However, since the offender's proxy rewrites URLs   
and strips JavaScript, we are unable to have a clickable link on the   
relayed page. 
 
We have reviewed your Acceptable Use Policy and have concluded that   
your customer is in violation of the section "Intellectual Property   
Infringement Policy" 
 
Please shut down the webprox.net service immediately. 
 
Thank you. 
 
 
 
 
 
MIME element (application/pkcs7-signature) MIME element (text/plain)
